title: An Act promoting the placement of foster children with family members and preventing discrimination against potential foster parents based on irrelevant convictions

abstracts.abstract: By Representative Meschino of Hull, a petition (accompanied by bill, House, No. 271) of Joan Meschino, David F. DeCoste and Colleen M. Garry relative to the placement of foster children with family members and preventing discrimination against potential foster parents based on irrelevant convictions.  Children, Families and Persons with Disabilities.

actions.description: Referred to the committee on Children, Families and Persons with Disabilities

related_entities.name: committee on Children, Families and Persons with Disabilities

actions.description: Hearing scheduled for 07/22/2025 from 01:00 PM-05:00 PM in A-1

Hearing rescheduled to 07/22/2025 from 01:00 PM-03:15 PM in A-1                                                                                                     and Virtual Hearing updated to New End Time
